page.title: 20POPULATION C. CROOKHAM
page.content:
Our community is composed of the residents of the quiet roads of detached or semi_detached houses, the three camps_Gurkhas at Queen Elizabeth Barracks, Army married quarters_ Quetta Park, and the Air Force housing Humphrey Park, together with the fairly scattered farming families and the people of the lower part of the small village of Ewshot,a mile away.In { Ewshot}Village Hall are playgroups, sales, w.i.meetings and events, visiting play companies, dances hockey and cricket clubs, art clubs areobics.The village is very active. { ::::::********:::::: This text was researched and compiled by the children and teachers of Crookham and Velmead Junior Schools.
Editor , {Cherry Luxton.
